QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(replace(n.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, case when n.encid = '' or n.encid is null then NULL else cast(replace(n.encid, 'E0000','') as bigint) end as VisitOccurrenceId, n.measurement_date, n.measurement_type, n.measurement_detail, n.measurement_value as test_result, CASE WHEN lower(n.measurement_value) = 'few' THEN 45878239 WHEN lower(n.measurement_value) = 'np' THEN 45878582 WHEN lower(n.measurement_value) = 'none' THEN 45878582 WHEN lower(n.measurement_value) = 'none seen' THEN 45878582 WHEN lower(n.measurement_value) = 'none see' THEN 45878582 WHEN lower(n.measurement_value) = 'negative' THEN 45878583 WHEN lower(n.measurement_value) = 'abnormal' THEN 45878745 WHEN lower(n.measurement_value) = 'present' THEN 45879438 WHEN lower(n.measurement_value) = 'pos' THEN 45879438 WHEN lower(n.measurement_value) = 'rare' THEN 45880295 WHEN lower(n.measurement_value) = 'trace' THEN 45881796 WHEN lower(n.measurement_value) = 'positive' THEN 45884084 WHEN lower(n.measurement_value) = 'absent' THEN 45884086 ELSE NULL END AS ValueAsConceptId from {sc}.nlp_measurement n JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND n.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where DATEPART(year, n.measurement_date) > 1900 order by cast(replace(n.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
